Token.Abstract: Provides a fast managed object cache where-in object instances are retained in memory to avoid hitting the Core Data persistent store. Performance is greatly increased over fetch request based strategy at the expense of memory consumption.

Initializes the receiver with a managed object context that is to be observed and used to populate the in memory cache. The receiver may then be used to fulfill cache requests for child contexts of the given managed object context.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectContext
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context with which to initialize the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Returns all managed objects for a given entity with attributes whose names and values match the given dictionary in a given context.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to retrieve managed objects for.

Parameter.Name: attributeValues
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary specifying the attribute criteria for retrieving managed objects.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectContext
Parameter.Abstract: The context to fetch the matching objects in.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to inform the receiver that an object was fetched and should be added to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object that was fetched from a managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to inform the receiver that an object was created and should be added to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object that was created in a managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to inform the receiver that an object was deleted and should be removed to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object that was deleted from a managed object context.
